title: Throne of Lies
description: I was called a prodigal son.A scion of Midas.I believed it. Why wouldn’t I?Everything my father touched turned to gold.The proof was all around me.Luxury cars.Elite schools.A billion-dollar business.Even my girlfriend, a Park Avenue Princess.I reigned from a throne of lies.My fall from grace . . . wasn’t graceful at all.The Prequel to Legacy of Lies
author: Tara  Leigh
